articles.author: Robert Smith, Owen Walker
articles.title: UBS launches first AT1 bonds since Credit Suisse takeover - Financial Times
articles.description: Investors return after write-off of $17bn of risky debt during Swiss banking deal
articles.content: UBS has raised $3.5bn of new additional tier 1 bonds after strong investor demand for its first deal since $17bn worth of the risky bank debt was wiped out when it took over rival lender Credit Suiss… [+3696 chars]
